title: Job Vacancies at AK.bet
content:
AK.bet is an innovative leader in the online betting industry, offering a wide array of sports betting and casino gaming experiences. We are committed to providing our customers with top-tier entertainment through cutting-edge technology, secure platforms, and fair play. At AK.bet, we foster a dynamic and inclusive workplace where creativity, collaboration, and professional growth are encouraged. Join our team and be part of a company that values excellence, integrity, and the pursuit of delivering exceptional gaming experiences.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Sales Representative

Job Location: Jabi, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Job Description


	Present, promote, and sell products/services to existing and potential customers.
	Establish and maintain positive business and customer relationships.
	Achieve agreed-upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule.
	Conduct market research to identify new sales opportunities and customer needs.
	Handle customer queries, resolve complaints, and ensure customer satisfaction.
	Maintain accurate records of sales, activities, and client interactions.
	Coordinate with team members and other departments to optimize sales efforts.
	Stay up to date with product knowledge, industry trends, and competitor activities.


Requirements & Qualifications


	HND / Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field (preferred).
	2 - 4 years of proven work experience as a Sales Representative or in a similar sales role.
	Proficiency in computer usage and typing
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Highly motivated and target-driven with a proven track record in sales.
	Strong organizational and time-management skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 20th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV to: akentertainment.hr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Twitter Ads Specialist

Job Location: Jabi, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for a results-driven Twitter Ads Professional to manage and optimize paid advertising campaigns on Twitter (X).
	The ideal candidate will be skilled in leveraging Twitter’s ad platform to build brand awareness, engage target audiences, and drive measurable results such as leads, sales, and conversions.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, create, and manage Twitter Ads campaigns including awareness, engagement, lead generation, and conversion objectives.
	Conduct audience research to identify and target the right demographics, interests, and behaviors.
	Develop and test ad creatives, copy, and formats to maximize click-through and conversion rates.
	Manage daily campaign budgets and bids to optimize cost-per-result and return on ad spend (ROAS).
	Monitor, analyze, and report on campaign performance using Twitter Analytics and other tracking tools.
	Implement A/B testing strategies for ad creatives, placements, and targeting.
	Stay updated on Twitter Ads policies, features, and best practices.
	Collaborate with the marketing/content team to align Twitter campaigns with broader digital strategies.


Requirements


	Proven experience in managing Twitter Ads campaigns.
	Strong understanding of paid social advertising, especially audience targeting and bidding strategies.
	Proficiency in Twitter Ads Manager and analytics tools.
	Creative mindset with strong copywriting and visual communication skills.
	Analytical ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights.
	Experience with multi-platform paid campaigns (Meta, Google Ads, LinkedIn) is a plus.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (preferred).
	2+ years of paid social media advertising experience.


Key Skills:


	Twitter Ads campaign management
	Audience segmentation & targeting
	Budget optimization
	Data analysis & reporting
	Creative testing (copywriting, visuals, A/B testing)


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 18th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV to: akentertainment.hr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Google Ads Professional

Job Location: Jabi, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a skilled and data-driven Google Ads Professional to plan, implement, and manage our paid advertising campaigns across Google platforms.
	The role requires expertise in pay-per-click (PPC) strategies, keyword research, campaign optimization, and analytics to drive qualified traffic, improve ROI, and achieve business goals.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, create, and manage Google Ads campaigns across Search, Display, Shopping, and YouTube.
	Conduct keyword research and optimize bidding strategies for maximum ROI.
	Write and test ad copy that drives clicks and conversions.
	Monitor and analyze campaign performance using Google Analytics and other reporting tools.
	Optimize landing pages for higher Quality Scores and conversion rates.
	Stay updated on Google Ads policies, new features, and industry best practices.
	Manage daily budgets, track spend, and provide regular performance reports.
	Perform A/B testing on ads, targeting, and creatives to continuously improve results.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to align paid campaigns with overall marketing objectives.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (preferred but not mandatory).
	2+ years of hands-on experience with Google Ads management.


Requirements


	Proven experience managing successful Google Ads campaigns.
	Strong knowledge of PPC, CPC, CPM, remarketing, and audience targeting.
	Proficiency in Google Ads, Google Analytics, and keyword research tools.
	Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret campaign data.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Google Ads Certification is an added advantage.


Key Skills:


	PPC campaign management
	Keyword research & targeting
	Budget management
	Data analysis & reporting
	Copywriting & A/B testing.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 18th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: akentertainment.hr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Project Analyst Job at erpSOFTapp




        
    

        
        erpSOFTapp is a business consultancy company that believes in the disruptive power of using Odoo Enterprise Resource Planning. We are passionate about improving your business operations and your productivity. Our main focus is ensuring our clients can maximise their investment on a scalable platform like Odoo ERP.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Analyst

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Part-time

Summary
     

            
    




	A Project Analyst plays a crucial role in supporting project managers and teams to ensure successful project execution. 


Key Responsibilities


	Project Planning: Assist in developing project plans, timelines, and budgets, and ensure alignment with organizational goals.
	Data Analysis: Collect, analyze, and report project data to provide insights and recommendations for improvement.
	Risk Management: Identify potential risks and issues, and propose mitigation strategies to minimize impact.
	Stakeholder Communication: Facilitate communication among project stakeholders, including team members, sponsors, and external vendors.
	Project Monitoring: Track project progress, identify potential roadblocks, and provide updates to stakeholders.
	Documentation: Prepare, review, and maintain project documentation, including reports, contracts, and financial records.


Requirements and Skills


	Education: Bachelor's degree in Business, Project Management, or a related field.
	Experience: 2-3 years of experience in project support or analyst role.
	Technical Skills: Proficiency in project management software (e.g., MS Project, JIRA) and data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, Power BI).
	Soft Skills: Excellent communication, problem-solving, and critical thinking skills, with the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
	Certifications: PMP, CAPM, or PRINCE2 certifications are preferred or required in some organizations.


Key Qualities:


	Attention to Detail: Meticulous in preparing documentation and reports.
	Analytical Skills: Strong ability to analyze data and provide actionable insights.
	Problem-Solving Skills: Effective in identifying potential issues and proposing solutions.
	Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills to facilitate stakeholder communication.
